general.description: Elpa was the first post-Incident Proteron colony which was able to sustain human life without significant terraforming, designated for the production of Proteron goods. It is, however, rather dry in every sense of the word.
general.bar: The bar hums with activity from traders and workers alike despite the lack of seating arrangements. None of them seem put out in the least by the weather, but your teeth itch.
